title: Is my account broken?
body:
Hi this is my first post am really confused about this game.

I win about 1 in 5 games am in silver 5  was silver 1 think I went on a 17 game lose streak.

Now I thought that was just a thing that you lose a lot but then I guy I told about how much I lose he said that riot don't like or your account might be broken??  every game I get matched with better players and my team have no idea what there doing.   

Is this true can your account be broken?
just played 15 games today and won 2.  I thought this was normal because i got use to it.
I played with a guy today who was mid he has 45 cs at 26 mins I checked his account and he is on a 3 game win streak!  haha

If someone could help me thanks and tell me is this true can yor account be broken??

replies.body: It is extremely unlikely that your account is 'broken', it's just it probably has a rather unfortunate mmr due to all the losses, which means you get matched with worse players, and it can feel snowbally until you are able to step up and make the difference to cause your team to win despite whatever questionable decisions your teammates may or may not have made.

thanks man  really bummed out
some guys just tried to help me get a win who was good he tried for 6 games   got him six losses  feel bad.  he actually said I am good just very unlucky.
sorry when you say I get matched with worse players  that just on my team??

Both teams with typically have approximately the same average mmr (purple side has very slightly higher mmr), so as your mmr goes down, you'll get matched both with and against relatively worse players.
I see  so this broken account thing is a myth?

Yes. A somewhat popular one, as it's easier to blame your account being 'broken' then it is to accept that you might not be as good as you think and it's related to you not carrying hard enough, but a myth nonetheless.

It is completely normal for people to start ranked, and get repeatedly destroyed over the first couple dozen games, end up tilted, and get destroyed even more. The trick is to just accept that lost cause games are a thing, but you can't help what other players do, and just focus on the mistakes you made yourself and try to fix those. Eventually you'll improve yourself to the point where you really can carry some rather 'rough' teams relatively speaking, and then you'll trend upwards. Repeat until challenger.
it is normal to lose a lot when you are first starting and eventually you will get better at losing less often.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
oh? been playing for 2 years like.
some guys is gonna help me now  gonna show me some things   10 hours nearly won last game
I don't understand what you mean by a broken account. Matchmaking only uses your MMR, not your username or anything.

this random guy has got me in trouble here haha  he said that u just get matched into losing games or something he did explain.   I just tried to duo with him  got him 6 losses.  am still gtrying to get a win today.  just lost another one.

Your match history looks normal enough for a low-elo solo support, that is, painful. Most of it is really just random luck. anything under gold V has tons of unranked or barely lv30 players this season, which adds a lot of unpredictability to matchmaking.

my account looks normal ?? wa ? i win 1 in 5 ?  I get bad team every game?  the one win was a guy afked on enemy team lol    I don't understand. must be just me guess i just keep playing I guess   17 games lose streak is normal?  wow ok   thanks for reply tho,
some guy just tried to help me feel bad for him he really tried haha I lost 6 in a row with him
Yes your account is broken.  I suggest calling an engineer and asking for them to run a diagnostic on all vital systems, including the engine, hydraulics, and optics.
No need for your sarcasm and jokes... The person is confused and just wants clarification, don't be a dick.
thanks for info.  am not a nerd just asking what a guy told me.
